summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.2°C) and outside temperature (down 2.8°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 268 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1733 m), feels like temperature (up 6.0°C), outside temperature (up 4.8°C), and inside temperature (up 1.9°C) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, humidity should not be a concern. A few light raindrops may fall, occasional overcast conditions, and the light is absent. The weather may be change rapidly and become worse.
